name: Darkukeo
description:
Darkukeo is an adventure game created by 3 colombian amateur game devs Juan Felipe, Alejandro and Gabriel, we are still students but our love to developing games is quite a lot. On this adventure Keo has to explore through floating islands that for some extrange reason lost all (or almost all) of ther light,Keo with his lantern has to complete puzzles on this islands and run from enemies so he can escape from this nightmare.

Created by:

Juan Felipe Osorio Puerta----3D Modeler/Animator

Alejandro Serna Gomez-------3D Modeler/Level designer

Gabriel Cornejo Botero-------Programmer/Level designer

Our itch.io´s:

Altserna

JuanFe06

Cornejoo
